channel.title: Comments on: Yahoo, Google and Microsoft agree on Sitemaps Spec

item.title: By: Arthur
item.dc:creator: Arthur
item.description: If you have any problems to create XML sitemap files for your sites, try <a href="http://www.sitemapwriter.com"/ rel="nofollow">Sitemap Writer Pro</a>. It is a simple tool that helps you to create and keep up-to-date sitemaps for your websites. Sitemap Writer Pro has <a href="http://www.sitemapwriter.com/onlinedocumentation.php#tools" rel="nofollow">new tools</a> - FTP manager for uploading sitemaps, search engine <a href="http://www.sitemapwriter.com/notify.php" rel="nofollow">notification tool</a>, site <a href="http://www.sitemapwriter.com/onlinedocumentation.php#crawler" rel="nofollow">crawler</a> for adding an URLs into the sitemap and Yahoo Index viewer.
item.content:encoded:
If you have any problems to create XML sitemap files for your sites, try Sitemap Writer Pro. It is a simple tool that helps you to create and keep up-to-date sitemaps for your websites.
Sitemap Writer Pro has new tools – FTP manager for uploading sitemaps, search engine notification tool, site crawler for adding an URLs into the sitemap and Yahoo Index viewer.

item.title: By: Kunal
item.dc:creator: Kunal
item.description: Hi all, Can anybody tell me the URL to ping yahoo??? Thanks, Kunal
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,
Can anybody tell me the URL to ping yahoo???
Thanks,
Kunal

item.title: By: Yuichiro Tanaka
item.dc:creator: Yuichiro Tanaka
item.description: I can ping Google by using the following URL. www.google.com/webmasters/sitemaps/ping?sitemap=sitemap_url Please try to ping again.
item.content:encoded:
I can ping Google by using the following URL.
http://www.google.com/webmasters/sitemaps/ping?sitemap=sitemap_url
Please try to ping again.

item.title: By: Standard Sitemaps From Google, Yahoo and Microsoft at T. Longren
item.dc:creator: Standard Sitemaps From Google, Yahoo and Microsoft at T. Longren
item.description: [...] Joseph Scott brings up an important aspect of this new spec, pinging. Pinging basically means that when you make an update to your blog or site, you can ping Google/Yahoo/MSN to let them know you’ve made an update. That way they can crawl your site sooner to index your new content. Pretty neat. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Joseph Scott brings up an important aspect of this new spec, pinging. Pinging basically means that when you make an update to your blog or site, you can ping Google/Yahoo/MSN to let them know you’ve made an update. That way they can crawl your site sooner to index your new content. Pretty neat. […]
